message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.
You took 90% last round, now it's my turn to propose a more balanced split.
Let's try a 60/40 split. This feels more fair to both of us, and keeps the negotiation moving forward.
I'm not willing to give up more than 45% of the total, but I'm willing to compromise on the split.
